thread.title: Very nice hotel with a very friendly staff
thread.title_full: Very nice hotel with a very friendly staff - Review of Le Pradey, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: punkrunner
title: Very nice hotel with a very friendly staff
text:
Hotel is nice and extremely well located at the Tuilerie Garden and the Seine. If you want to go running along the Seine river in the morning this hotel is perfectly placed.
Hotel is well designed and the rooms have a good size.
